module, product property feature definition, product property instanced feature
Establishment of neutral assembly model within STEP is quite important and urgent issue from various application viewpoints, such as parametric assembly, assembly/disassembly process planning, kinematic analysis, and tolerance analysis. Features and their relationship play a key role to represent the relationship among the assembled components. This document is the draft technical specification of an application module for the product property feature definition and its relationships as a base of the features needed to represent the assembly model.
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the definitions of the class of features and how these structures relate to product data, but does not include detailed definition of items of features.
specification of the use of a characterized object as a feature definition of a product;
specification of the use of a shape aspect as a instanced feature of a product;
detailed definition and representation of feature definition and instanced features.
feature an element to specify the properties of the components
feature relationship a relationship between a pair of the features of the components
-->
The Product property feature UoF specifies the definitional information for the overall concept of features.
